AD_FishChanting.synopsis: Fanatical chanting at the altar of a murder god, a crowd heard from afar rather than direct dialogue. This dialog has no lines that are spoken by the character - the lines are intended to be subtitles for the SFX

SpeakWithBOOOAL.synopsis: The player encounters a group of kuo-toa, humanoid fish beings capable of creating gods just by imagining them. They're overzealous and easily duped, and are currently worshipping a murderous redcap they've mistaken for a god of murder. He's capitalising on the situation and very much enjoying the incredible power with which he's been invested. In this dialogue, we can deal with him as this great inscrutable power, or see through the situation and expose / do a deal with him. In all cases he's brash, offensive and generally gross.The all cap lines are BOOOAL in his fully powerful form.When we suddenly rever to lower caps, it's when we've forced him into his 'common' form.BOOOAL = Boo-AHHL (almost guttural)Kuo-Toa = Koo-oh-TO-ah
SpeakWithBOOOAL.how_to_trigger: load WLD_Main_Agoto -418.88, 5.08, 271.47speak with the Priest KuoToa

AD_GodDead.synopsis: The Kuo-toa have found their god dead.

AD_BOOOALAppears.synopsis: This line plays when we force a creature to reveal itself by overwhelming it with bloodlust

KuoToaMinion.synopsis: A  node that plays when the player tries to click on a praying kuotoa. They will either praise you as the Chosen of their madeup god, or make you a new made-up god.BOOOAL - Booh-ALMahkloompah - mak-LOOM-pah

PAD_MagicGone.synopsis: This PAD triggers if/when the player kills all the Kuo-Toa and BOOOAL's magic disappates - the beat is 'he was no true god, his power came from those fish creatures'.

HighPriest.synopsis: The Zealot is a Kuo Toa obsessed with his new god - you. You've slain the 'pretender' he was just as dedicated to only moments before, and he's transferred all that zealotry to you.Mahkloompah = ma-KLOOM-pa.

AD_NoAnswerFromGod.synopsis: The player has clicked an altar from which a godly presence spoke previously.

automatic_ordering.reasoning: Several sessions in the game’s dialog tree depend on the player’s handling of the kuo-toa and their faux‐god. The base encounter is in 'SpeakWithBOOOAL', where the player meets a group of kuo‐toa worshipping a redcap mistaken as a god. In one branch, if the player forces the creature into bloodlust, it reveals itself – triggering 'AD_BOOOALAppears'. This revelation then leads to the discovery that the god is dead, triggering 'AD_GodDead', and once all the kuo‐toa (and the creature’s magic) are eliminated, the magic dissipates (PAD_MagicGone). In another branch from 'SpeakWithBOOOAL', if the player instead slays the pretender, his fanatic minion (the HighPriest) later transfers his zeal to the player (HighPriest). Because these represent conflicting outcomes of the encounter (either the magic fades once the worshippers’ power departs, or the fanatic zeal transfers to you), the sessions 'HighPriest' and 'PAD_MagicGone' cannot both occur in the same playthrough – they are mutually exclusive. Separately, there is a flavor sequence in which the player hears fanatical chanting at an altar in 'AD_FishChanting' and, later when clicking the same (or a related) altar, receives no reply from the god ('AD_NoAnswerFromGod'). This suggests a simple ordering where the chanting happens first, enabling the later call that yields no answer. Sessions such as 'KuoToaMinion' are triggered by incidental interactions and do not impose ordering constraints. Only sessions with explicit cause–effect or mutually exclusive outcomes are included below.

SpeakWithBOOOAL_14.speaker: Pooldripp the Zealous
SpeakWithBOOOAL_14.text: Our blood to fill your oceans, oh blessed BOOOAL! Our bones to build your temple in the deep!
SpeakWithBOOOAL_14.context: NodeContext: Fanatic devotion, speaking to the air/altar

SpeakWithBOOOAL_136.speaker: Narrator
SpeakWithBOOOAL_136.text: *A wave of pure devotion washes over you - and with every surge, you feel a presence grow in response.*

SpeakWithBOOOAL_17.speaker: BOOOAL
SpeakWithBOOOAL_17.text: WORDS, PRIEST. PROMISES. YOUR GOD WANTS PROOF. WANTS BLOOD.
SpeakWithBOOOAL_17.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his god form. He should be invisible with some VFXNodeContext: DISMISSIVE, IMPATIENT

SpeakWithBOOOAL_115.speaker: Narrator
SpeakWithBOOOAL_115.text: *These beings are kuo-toa - former mind flayer slaves that manifest their gods through sheer belief.*

SpeakWithBOOOAL_142.context: CinematicNodeContext: The priest turns to spot the playerNodeContext: The priest turns to spot the player

SpeakWithBOOOAL_26.speaker: Pooldripp the Zealous
SpeakWithBOOOAL_26.text: YOU! Our Lord of Murder demands sacrifice! You will be an offering for the great god BOOOAL!

SpeakWithBOOOAL_65.speaker: Player
SpeakWithBOOOAL_65.text: You can give it a rest. Your 'god' isn't real.

SpeakWithBOOOAL_103.speaker: Pooldripp the Zealous
SpeakWithBOOOAL_103.context: NodeContext: Last thing he was expecting - taken slightly aback for a moment

SpeakWithBOOOAL_111.speaker: Player
SpeakWithBOOOAL_111.text: Bhaal is the true Lord of Murder. Perhaps I should offer you instead.

SpeakWithBOOOAL_48.speaker: Pooldripp the Zealous
SpeakWithBOOOAL_48.text: Bhaal...? No... we are... we are faithful to Lord BOOOAL...

SpeakWithBOOOAL_20.speaker: Narrator
SpeakWithBOOOAL_20.text: *You sense a flicker of doubt - brief, but enough. For an instant, the godly presence falters.*

SpeakWithBOOOAL_90.speaker: BOOOAL
SpeakWithBOOOAL_90.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in the process of reverting back to his common form. He is invisible for "NO! NO" and becomes visible for "Stop that!"NodeContext: Furious, panicked - his con is being exposed and he's losing power even as he speaks

SpeakWithBOOOAL_104.speaker: Player
SpeakWithBOOOAL_104.text: Murmur a prayer. Wherever you go, your god holds sway.

SpeakWithBOOOAL_123.speaker: Player
SpeakWithBOOOAL_123.text: He's a fabrication. Whatever you created him for, you don't need him.

SpeakWithBOOOAL_40.speaker: BOOOAL
SpeakWithBOOOAL_40.text: ARGH! NO! SHUT IT! Shut your rotten mouth!
SpeakWithBOOOAL_40.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in the process of reverting back into his common form. He is invisible for the capitalised parts of this now, but then becomes visible for "Shut your rotten mouth"NodeContext: The lack of faith is literally draining power from him - sulky and furious all in one as he returns to his common form

SpeakWithBOOOAL_152.speaker: Narrator
SpeakWithBOOOAL_152.text: *You feel the presence waver - one moment a god of awesome power, the next... a common redcap.*

SpeakWithBOOOAL_165.speaker: BOOOAL
SpeakWithBOOOAL_165.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his common form. He is no longer invisible, and he appears as a redacapNodeContext: Realising the game is up

SpeakWithBOOOAL_33.speaker: BOOOAL
SpeakWithBOOOAL_33.text: Don't do anything hasty, now. The fishfolk got plenty of power - we can share.
SpeakWithBOOOAL_33.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his common form. He is no longer invisible, and appears as a common redcapNodeContext: Still annoyed with us but willing to make a deal. Only SLIGHTLY wheedling - redcaps aren't known for negotiating

SpeakWithBOOOAL_27.speaker: BOOOAL
SpeakWithBOOOAL_27.text: Shut it, you!  I'm talking to... my Chosen! Chosen got power - you want power, don't ya?
SpeakWithBOOOAL_27.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his common form. He is no longer invisible, and just appears as an ordinary redcapNodeContext: Shouting his high priest down - he wants to seal the deal with us before his idiot followers fully catch on

SpeakWithBOOOAL_21.speaker: BOOOAL
SpeakWithBOOOAL_21.text: That depends on the fishfolk, don't it? But plenty to go around.
SpeakWithBOOOAL_21.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his common form. He's no longer invisible and just appears as a common redcapNodeContext: Eyes wide, dropping hints and urging you to play along.

SpeakWithBOOOAL_130.speaker: Player
SpeakWithBOOOAL_130.text: I'll just kill you and claim it for myself.

SpeakWithBOOOAL_135.speaker: BOOOAL
SpeakWithBOOOAL_135.text: Kiss my arse. I'm the Lord of Murder - I'll show you why.
SpeakWithBOOOAL_135.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his common form. He is no longer invisible and appears as just a common redcapNodeContext: Aggressive - he tried to be reasonable, now he just wants to kill us for the pleasure of it

SpeakWithBOOOAL_56.speaker: Player
SpeakWithBOOOAL_56.text: [To priest] Well? Bow before BOOOAL's Chosen!

SpeakWithBOOOAL_5.speaker: Narrator
SpeakWithBOOOAL_5.text: *You feel a swell of power again as the creatures redouble their prayers.*

SpeakWithBOOOAL_80.context: CinematicNodeContext: Kuotoa pray fervently as the redcap flickers out of existence, 'presence' returns.

SpeakWithBOOOAL_141.speaker: BOOOAL
SpeakWithBOOOAL_141.text: AH. BETTER. YOU ENT HALF-BAD - I THINK I'LL KEEP YOU.
SpeakWithBOOOAL_141.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his god form. He should be invisible with some VFXNodeContext: Releif and energy - his power is surging back into him. Last part is almost a pat on the head kind of affection

SpeakWithBOOOAL_10.speaker: BOOOAL
SpeakWithBOOOAL_10.text: GO THEN, CHOSEN. TELL THE SURFACE WORLD BOOOAL IS COMING. AND SO YOU DON'T FORGET -
SpeakWithBOOOAL_10.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his god form. He should be invisible with some VFXNodeContext: Grand, bold, trying to be an image of a powerful god

SpeakWithBOOOAL_73.speaker: BOOOAL
SpeakWithBOOOAL_73.text: HERE. THIS BLADE IS MY TONGUE - AND I WANT A TASTE OF EVERY LIFE YOU TAKE.
SpeakWithBOOOAL_73.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his god form. He should be invisible with some VFXNodeContext: Hint of warning.

SpeakWithBOOOAL_138.speaker: BOOOAL
SpeakWithBOOOAL_138.text: GO WITH MY BLESSING, CHOSEN. TELL THE WORLD THAT BOOOAL IS COMING. SHOW THEM MY POWER.
SpeakWithBOOOAL_138.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his god form. He should be invisible with some VFXNodeContext: Grand, bold, trying to be an image of a powerful god

SpeakWithBOOOAL_69.speaker: BOOOAL
SpeakWithBOOOAL_69.text: BUT CHOSEN... JUST DON'T FORGET WHERE YOU GOT IT FROM.
SpeakWithBOOOAL_69.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his god form. He should be invisible with some VFXNodeContext: Hint of warning.

SpeakWithBOOOAL_30.speaker: Narrator
SpeakWithBOOOAL_30.text: *Mad guilt swills in your swooning, sick body. Today you became the tart of a false God, and your evil pride revolts.*

SpeakWithBOOOAL_72.speaker: Player
SpeakWithBOOOAL_72.text: I don't need your power - or theirs.

SpeakWithBOOOAL_139.speaker: BOOOAL
SpeakWithBOOOAL_139.text: Kiss my arse, then. This Lord of Murder likes doing his own dirty work.
SpeakWithBOOOAL_139.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his common form. He is no longer invisible and appears as just a common redcapNodeContext: Aggressive - he tried to be reasonable, now he just wants to kill us for the pleasure of it

SpeakWithBOOOAL_164.speaker: BOOOAL
SpeakWithBOOOAL_164.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his god form. He should be invisible with some VFXNodeContext: Fanatical war cry

SpeakWithBOOOAL_131.speaker: Player
SpeakWithBOOOAL_131.text: I won't let you enslave them any longer.

SpeakWithBOOOAL_77.speaker: Player
SpeakWithBOOOAL_77.text: I need no god to claim my power. I will show them the way of my oath.

SpeakWithBOOOAL_75.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player looking obnoxiously high and mighty

SpeakWithBOOOAL_92.speaker: Pooldripp the Zealous
SpeakWithBOOOAL_92.text: Yes. Yes - I sense light. Love. A new god, to show us the way!

SpeakWithBOOOAL_15.speaker: Pooldripp the Zealous
SpeakWithBOOOAL_15.text: Yes. Yes - I sense justice. Honour. A new god, to show us the way!

SpeakWithBOOOAL_71.speaker: BOOOAL
SpeakWithBOOOAL_71.text: No, no, NO! I'm the Lord of Murder, ME!

SpeakWithBOOOAL_107.speaker: Pooldripp the Zealous
SpeakWithBOOOAL_107.text: Yes. Yes - I sense judgement. Retribution. A new god, to show us the way!
SpeakWithBOOOAL_107.context: NodeContext: His psychic energy is picking up on our paladin oath - and he likes it

SpeakWithBOOOAL_110.speaker: Player
SpeakWithBOOOAL_110.text: LIAR. DESTROY THE PRETENDER GOD, MY CHOSEN!

SpeakWithBOOOAL_125.context: CinematicNodeContext: The kuo toa look at the player, enthralled. The player points a hand at the red cap commandingly.

SpeakWithBOOOAL_132.speaker: Pooldripp the Zealous
SpeakWithBOOOAL_132.context: NodeContext: As if snapping out of a trance - shaking off doubt and getting angry at player

SpeakWithBOOOAL_70.speaker: BOOOAL
SpeakWithBOOOAL_70.text: YES, PRIEST. TRUST BOOOAL. THAT'UN'S A HERETIC - SO START CUTTING.
SpeakWithBOOOAL_70.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his god form. He should be invisible with some VFXNodeContext: Smug, urging his priest on to bloodshed

SpeakWithBOOOAL_31.speaker: Player
SpeakWithBOOOAL_31.text: Look at me. If there's any god of death here, it's me.

SpeakWithBOOOAL_49.speaker: Player
SpeakWithBOOOAL_49.text: Seriously - 'BOOOAL'? Whatever this thing is, he didn't even feed you a good lie.

SpeakWithBOOOAL_119.speaker: Player
SpeakWithBOOOAL_119.text: I AM BOOOAL, LORD OF MURDER, VISCOUNT OF VIOLENCE. THIS ONE LIES.

SpeakWithBOOOAL_114.speaker: Player
SpeakWithBOOOAL_114.text: 'BOOOAL'? Bhaal is the god of murder.

SpeakWithBOOOAL_63.speaker: BOOOAL
SpeakWithBOOOAL_63.text: THAT SO, CUTLET? I'M A GOD, AND I FANCY A BIT OF MURDER. SIMPLE ENOUGH.
SpeakWithBOOOAL_63.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his god form. He should be invisible with some VFXNodeContext: Snorting with laughter, dismissive - he wants slaughter, and no well-placed argument is going to sway him from it

SpeakWithBOOOAL_95.speaker: BOOOAL
SpeakWithBOOOAL_95.text: WELL IT ISN'T MURDER IF YOU'RE WILLING - IS IT, CUTLET?
SpeakWithBOOOAL_95.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his god form. He should be invisible with some VFXNodeContext: Air of 'D'UH!' about it

SpeakWithBOOOAL_163.speaker: Player
SpeakWithBOOOAL_163.text: Get your bearings. What have you stumbled in on?

SpeakWithBOOOAL_66.speaker: Narrator
SpeakWithBOOOAL_66.text: *That sickle blade - it's no religious totem. It belongs to a common redcap, fey creatures known for their bloodlust.*
SpeakWithBOOOAL_66.context: CinematicNodeContext: Feature a close-up of the sickle-blade S_Und_KuoToa_HighPriest is holding (branch checks to make sure he has it)

SpeakWithBOOOAL_85.speaker: BOOOAL
SpeakWithBOOOAL_85.text: WELL, PRIEST? BOOOAL WANTS A SACRIFICE! BOOOAL WANTS BLOOD.
SpeakWithBOOOAL_85.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his god form. He should be invisible with some VFXNodeContext: Impatient - his high priest is not acting swiftly enough for him, and the longer this goes on the more chance he'll be exposed

SpeakWithBOOOAL_98.speaker: Player
SpeakWithBOOOAL_98.text: Fool. I kill in my sleep. If you seek death, death itself is here.

SpeakWithBOOOAL_11.speaker: Player
SpeakWithBOOOAL_11.text: Wait! If it's blood you want, I can make another offer.

SpeakWithBOOOAL_44.speaker: BOOOAL
SpeakWithBOOOAL_44.text: OH? WHAT'S THAT, THEN? WHAT YOU GOT FOR BLESSED BOOOAL?
SpeakWithBOOOAL_44.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his god form. He should be invisible with some VFXNodeContext: Waiting to be impressed, smugly certain that we can't

SpeakWithBOOOAL_81.speaker: BOOOAL
SpeakWithBOOOAL_81.text: OH? WHAT'S THAT, THEN? SEE YOU GOT MEAT TO SPARE.
SpeakWithBOOOAL_81.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his god form. He should be invisible with some VFXNodeContext: Piqued his interest - he's taken an interest in one of our companions

SpeakWithBOOOAL_137.speaker: BOOOAL
SpeakWithBOOOAL_137.text: WHAT YOU GOT FOR BLESSED BOOOAL?
SpeakWithBOOOAL_137.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his god form. He should be invisible with some VFXNodeContext: Tone of 'impress me'

SpeakWithBOOOAL_53.speaker: Player
SpeakWithBOOOAL_53.text: You want me to sacrifice one of my friends?

SpeakWithBOOOAL_64.speaker: Lae'zel
SpeakWithBOOOAL_64.text: You wouldn't dare betray a child of Gith on the whims of this web-toed wonder.

SpeakWithBOOOAL_24.speaker: Karlach
SpeakWithBOOOAL_24.text: Don't look at me. I just got out of devil hell. I'm not going to fishy hell any time soon.

SpeakWithBOOOAL_116.speaker: Astarion
SpeakWithBOOOAL_116.text: I want to wake up beside a handsome virgin every morning, but life doesn't give us what we want. Can we kill this 'god' now?
SpeakWithBOOOAL_116.context: NodeContext: Tired of this conversation. A 'God' (who's clearly some mouthy git pretending to be a god) has just told the player he wants them to sacrifice you. You're not impressed.

SpeakWithBOOOAL_112.speaker: Wyll
SpeakWithBOOOAL_112.text: Don't be rash, now. I may be tolerant, but I won't let myself be fed to the fishes.

SpeakWithBOOOAL_25.speaker: Gale
SpeakWithBOOOAL_25.text: Tread carefully, now. Not even a god would survive sacrificing me.

SpeakWithBOOOAL_18.speaker: BOOOAL
SpeakWithBOOOAL_18.text: IT'S SIMPLE. MAKE AN OFFERING - OR BECOME ONE.
SpeakWithBOOOAL_18.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his god form. He should be invisible with some VFX

SpeakWithBOOOAL_58.speaker: Astarion
SpeakWithBOOOAL_58.text: What? You're bowing to this gutter-throated idol?
SpeakWithBOOOAL_58.context: NodeContext: Disbelief, Players have betrayed Astarion

SpeakWithBOOOAL_60.speaker: Astarion
SpeakWithBOOOAL_60.text: You wretched little worm. I'll show you murder worthy of a god!
SpeakWithBOOOAL_60.context: NodeContext: Players have betrayed Astarion and he's about to attack them.

SpeakWithBOOOAL_41.speaker: Shadowheart
SpeakWithBOOOAL_41.text: You can sacrifice yourself first, you spineless rat!

SpeakWithBOOOAL_67.speaker: Karlach
SpeakWithBOOOAL_67.text: Godsdammit soldier, I trusted you! And now I have to kill you and all these weird fish lads. Ugh!
SpeakWithBOOOAL_67.context: NodeContext: Super frustrated the player is trying to sacrifice her to some fish people

SpeakWithBOOOAL_78.speaker: Wyll
SpeakWithBOOOAL_78.text: So it's like that, is it? So be it - the Blade does not yield!

SpeakWithBOOOAL_54.speaker: Gale
SpeakWithBOOOAL_54.text: Not treading carefully, then? Out with a bang it is.
SpeakWithBOOOAL_54.context: NodeContext: The last line can be said with some fierceness. You're about to go into combat.

SpeakWithBOOOAL_79.speaker: BOOOAL
SpeakWithBOOOAL_79.text: GONNA BREAK YOU UNDER MY BOOTS! GONNA BATHE IN YOUR BLOOD!
SpeakWithBOOOAL_79.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his god form. He should be invisible with some VFX

SpeakWithBOOOAL_87.speaker: Player
SpeakWithBOOOAL_87.text: I have only one life. But I can kill many more in your name.

SpeakWithBOOOAL_122.speaker: BOOOAL
SpeakWithBOOOAL_122.text: THAT SOUNDS LIKE A LOT MORE BLOOD. A LOT MORE MESS. GOOD.
SpeakWithBOOOAL_122.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his god form. He should be invisible with some VFXNodeContext: Considering, approving, bare quavering of excitement

SpeakWithBOOOAL_155.speaker: BOOOAL
SpeakWithBOOOAL_155.text: OH, DON'T WORRY. REST O' THE WORLD WILL KNOW ME SOON ENOUGH.
SpeakWithBOOOAL_155.context: NodeContext: Smug, uninterested - he's all powerful, and doesn't need us

SpeakWithBOOOAL_145.speaker: BOOOAL
SpeakWithBOOOAL_145.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his god form. He should be invisible with some VFXNodeContext: Devious, looking forward to killing us

SpeakWithBOOOAL_62.speaker: Player
SpeakWithBOOOAL_62.text: The mercy of a quick death.

SpeakWithBOOOAL_22.speaker: Player
SpeakWithBOOOAL_22.text: Redcaps love violence - bait him with an exaggerated tale of battle and bloodshed.

SpeakWithBOOOAL_100.speaker: BOOOAL
SpeakWithBOOOAL_100.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his god form. He should be invisible with some VFXNodeContext: Getting lost in the pure joy of the slaughter

SpeakWithBOOOAL_149.speaker: Narrator
SpeakWithBOOOAL_149.text: *In the outburst of emotion, you feel the divine presence falter - then revert to its basic, cruel nature.*

SpeakWithBOOOAL_101.context: CinematicNodeContext: Redcap forgets himself in his bloodlust, pops back into visibility.NodeContext: Redcap forgets himself in his bloodlust, pops back into visibility.

SpeakWithBOOOAL_0.speaker: BOOOAL
SpeakWithBOOOAL_0.text: TALK IS FINE. TASTE IS BETTER. PRIEST!
SpeakWithBOOOAL_0.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his god form. He should be invisible with some VFXNodeContext: Dismissive of our stories, wants to get straight to killing - calling to his priest to attack us

SpeakWithBOOOAL_57.speaker: Player
SpeakWithBOOOAL_57.text: Are your followers aware you're just a rabid little fey creature?

SpeakWithBOOOAL_160.speaker: BOOOAL
SpeakWithBOOOAL_160.text: LITTLE?! I'M A GOD. AND I'M GONNA RIP YOU - TEAR YOU - WEAR YOU FOR A HAT -
SpeakWithBOOOAL_160.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his god form. He should be invisible with some VFXNodeContext: Furious - he is an actual fact VERY little, and goes a bit rabid when insulted

SpeakWithBOOOAL_133.speaker: BOOOAL
SpeakWithBOOOAL_133.text: OI, PRIEST! YOU GONNA LET THIS'UN GIVE CHEEK TO YOUR GOD?
SpeakWithBOOOAL_133.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his god form. He should be invisible with some VFXNodeContext: Barking to his priest to get ready to attack us

SpeakWithBOOOAL_82.speaker: Player
SpeakWithBOOOAL_82.text: Try to determine who - or what - they're talking to.

SpeakWithBOOOAL_117.speaker: Narrator
SpeakWithBOOOAL_117.text: *This presence... the magic is not divine, but fey. And it is murderous.*

SpeakWithBOOOAL_106.speaker: Player
SpeakWithBOOOAL_106.text: Think back to your studies of kuo-toa and their gods for any useful information.

SpeakWithBOOOAL_89.speaker: Narrator
SpeakWithBOOOAL_89.text: *'Boooal' is not a recorded kuo-toa god, but the species is susceptible to mind control and trickery. This wouldn't be their first pretender god.*

SpeakWithBOOOAL_148.speaker: Player
SpeakWithBOOOAL_148.text: YOU ARE LISTENING TO A FALSEHOOD. HE IS NOT YOUR REAL GOD.

SpeakWithBOOOAL_166.speaker: Narrator
SpeakWithBOOOAL_166.text: *You don't recognise the creatures - but this voice seems to have a hold over them.*

SpeakWithBOOOAL_29.speaker: BOOOAL
SpeakWithBOOOAL_29.text: YOU'VE MADE YOUR OFFERING. EVEN BETTER - YOU MADE A MESS.
SpeakWithBOOOAL_29.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his god form. He should be invisible with some VFX

SpeakWithBOOOAL_50.speaker: BOOOAL
SpeakWithBOOOAL_50.text: I THINK I'LL KEEP YOU - CHOSEN.
SpeakWithBOOOAL_50.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his god form. He should be invisible with some VFX

SpeakWithBOOOAL_109.speaker: BOOOAL
SpeakWithBOOOAL_109.text: GO WITH MY BLESSING - SHOW THE WORLD THE POWER OF BOOOAL!
SpeakWithBOOOAL_109.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his god form. He should be invisible with some VFX

SpeakWithBOOOAL_9.speaker: BOOOAL
SpeakWithBOOOAL_9.text: AND CHOSEN... SO YOU DON'T FORGET-
SpeakWithBOOOAL_9.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his god form. He should be invisible with some VFX

SpeakWithBOOOAL_39.speaker: BOOOAL
SpeakWithBOOOAL_39.text: DON'T WANT PRAYERS FROM YOU, CHOSEN - WANT BLOOD. ON YOU GO.
SpeakWithBOOOAL_39.context: CinematicNodeContext: BOOOAL is in his god form. He should be invisible with some VFXNodeContext: We've returned to speak to BOOOAL after he's dismissed us to go kill in his name.

AD_GodDead_0.speaker: GROUP_Act1_UND_KuoToa
AD_GodDead_0.text: BOOOAL! Our Lord has been murdered!
AD_GodDead_0.context: NodeContext: Dismay, grief - their god has been killed

AD_BOOOALAppears_0.speaker: BOOOAL
AD_BOOOALAppears_0.text: CUT YOU BREAK YOU TASTE YOU!

KuoToaMinion_2.speaker: Narrator
KuoToaMinion_2.text: *The creature is lost in devotion. You might as well not exist.*

PAD_MagicGone_0.speaker: Player
PAD_MagicGone_0.text: Not much of a god after all. Whatever power he had, it died with those creatures.
PAD_MagicGone_0.context: NodeContext: BOO-al (not pronounced with extra emphasis, its just how the local fish people stylize it)

HighPriest_14.speaker: Pooldripp the Zealous
HighPriest_14.text: We know that you must go, great Mahkloompah. We will tend your church down here, and wait... until the time is right.
HighPriest_14.context: NodeContext: Sinister - imagining some great crusade of slaughter upon the surface world.

HighPriest_17.speaker: Pooldripp the Zealous
HighPriest_17.text: You've slain the pretender! We knew in our hearts the god BOOOAL was false.
HighPriest_17.context: NodeContext: In awe of you, rushing to affirm his faith - and absolutely means it

HighPriest_0.speaker: Pooldripp the Zealous
HighPriest_0.text: But you - we see you. We know you by your true name... MAHKLOOMPAH!
HighPriest_0.context: NodeContext: Kuo-Toa give overwrought, nonsensical names to their gods. Air of great ceremony as he bestows one on you

HighPriest_6.speaker: Lae'zel
HighPriest_6.text: A god to the fishes. A dream come true, is it?

HighPriest_10.speaker: Shadowheart
HighPriest_10.text: If you're expecting me to drop to my knees before you, forget it.

HighPriest_4.speaker: Karlach
HighPriest_4.context: NodeContext: Teasing you but pretending to be super into it

HighPriest_16.speaker: Pooldripp the Zealous
HighPriest_16.text: What is to be your first commandment, oh great god?

HighPriest_5.speaker: Player
HighPriest_5.text: A better name than 'Mahkloompah', for one.

HighPriest_15.speaker: Pooldripp the Zealous
HighPriest_15.text: You are too modest, great one. This name perfectly captures your essence - your fury.
HighPriest_15.context: NodeContext: Zealous, not to be swayed.

HighPriest_1.speaker: Player
HighPriest_1.text: Go out and build me an army.

HighPriest_2.speaker: Pooldripp the Zealous
HighPriest_2.text: We will spread word of Mahkloompah. Your glory will sing from ten thousand throats!

HighPriest_21.speaker: Pooldripp the Zealous
HighPriest_21.text: ... you test us, great one. There are other ways of showing devotion.
HighPriest_21.context: NodeContext: Slightly taken back, and faith only redoubling

HighPriest_11.speaker: Pooldripp the Zealous
HighPriest_11.text: Strangulation, perhaps. No matter - your glory will be sung, great Mahkloompah!
HighPriest_11.context: NodeContext: Scholarly consideration, devotion - likes the challenge

HighPriest_19.speaker: Player
HighPriest_19.text: Just keep doing what you're doing.

HighPriest_24.speaker: Pooldripp the Zealous
HighPriest_24.text: Our blood to fill your oceans, great Mahkloompah! Our bones to build your temple in the deep!
HighPriest_24.context: NodeContext: Fanatic - air of prayer about it, repeating exactly the same devotion he gave to the 'god' you killed

HighPriest_9.speaker: Player
HighPriest_9.text: Perhaps you should study the teachings of my god.

HighPriest_22.speaker: Pooldripp the Zealous
HighPriest_22.text: Yes - yes! We will study this being who claims power over you, great Mahkloompah.
HighPriest_22.context: NodeContext: Furious devotion - missing the point

HighPriest_12.speaker: Pooldripp the Zealous
HighPriest_12.text: So that, one day... we might destroy them.

HighPriest_20.speaker: Astarion
HighPriest_20.text: If they ask for a sacrifice, I'd suggest virgins. Young and hot-blooded.

HighPriest_7.speaker: Wyll
HighPriest_7.text: Oh hells, why not? All hail MAHKLOOMPAH!

HighPriest_13.speaker: Gale
HighPriest_13.text: A great deity needs a great name. Looks like you're off to a good start.

AD_NoAnswerFromGod_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_NoAnswerFromGod_0.text: *There is no answer from the presence.*
